SopcMvr.description: FB variant for SEPTIC >= 2.79. Use DUMMY_TAG to disable connections where NotUsed is not indicated.

SopcMvr_v2.75.description: FB variant for SEPTIC <= v2.75. Use DUMMY_TAG to disable connections where NotUsed is not indicated.

SopcDvr.description: FB variant. Use DUMMY_TAG to disable DvSwitchTag/DvTrackTag.
